name: Manananggal
description:
MANANANGGAL

---

This is my submission for GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme "JOINED TOGETHER".

I mostly new to game jams; this is only my second one. I am new to Godot and new to gamedev in general, so be kind, rewind.

Credits:

Mostly a solo effort, but special thanks to:

- most of the sprites were made by me (please excuse the programmer art), but the ground and background tilesets were modified from a tileset from this tutorial on CodingKaiju.com

- Jaime Garcia - for custom BGM and  for SFX sourcing

- the other members of the Camote Discord for suggestions, playtesting, bug reports, etc

How to pronounce the title

Thanks for playing!

---

Stack:

- Engine: Godot 3.3

- Splash screen: Made using Procreate on iPad

- Pixel art: https://www.piskelapp.com

- Sound FX: https://sfxr.me/

- BG Music: https://onlinesequencer.net/

- Font: Xolonium-Regular from the Godot Dodge tutorial

itch.io: https://hungryroy.itch.io/manananggal
